about_the_game:
THE WHIMSICAL WORLD OF THE ARRETAI

Featuring three unique, hand-crafted biomes, WILLOW’S DESCENT: INTO THE UNDER invites players to explore the world inhabited by Willow and her fellow Arretai. Jump around deadly spikes and mushroomflowers in the forest outside Willow's village, dash across the desert sands and ancient ruins, and finally, tread carefully in the deep caves as you reach ever closer to finding Pico!

UNIQUE TWISTS ON CLASSIC MECHANICS

Willow's Descent brings time-tested platforming mechanics and elements and combines them in a variety of ways to create a feeling of rising challenge and intensity. Leap on floating platforms, but you may find yourself unable to stay for long if they're heading somewhere you don't want to be!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ (2 * 2600) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 430 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 5570 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience the beautiful, hand-drawn world of the Arretai in this atmospheric precision platformer. Dive deeper into the Under and overcome unique platforming challenges in search of your missing sister.
